visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Average Rainfall'. The chart should have axes and labels styled with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the rainfall data for London, with each month as a category on the x-axis. Custom colors should be applied to the series, and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend should be set.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Average Rainfall'. The chart includes a subtitle with a hyperlink to the source data. The x-axis represents months with categories from January to December, and the y-axis represents rainfall in millimeters. The tooltip displays the series name and the corresponding rainfall value. The data series includes rainfall data for London, styled with a custom color. Additional configurations include setting the chart background color, disabling credits, enabling exporting, and adjusting the chart margins for better readability. The legend is enabled and styled with a specific font size and color.
